name: Ghost in a Psychiatry
description:
You are a ghost captured in a Psychiatry. You decide to escape, luckily You have a weapon, you can shoot flames. There are other agressive patients and nurses. The psychiatry is ugly, but there are some pictures on the wall.

You control with cursor-keys and shooting is with space-bar.

This game is made for the "Minimalist Horror Game Jam #1" (72 hours)

The music is by Boris Grabule
